entry.title: The Evolving Landscape of Dataloading
entry.summary:
Description

Data loading is a critical component in every ML training system. This session covers the dataloading in and around PyTorch today, the pain-points we hear from users, and industry trends. We focus on how we are thinking about our systems as we see models, datasets, and hardware continue to â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Data loading is a critical component in every ML training system. This session covers the dataloading in and around PyTorch today, the pain-points we hear from users, and industry trends. We focus on how we are thinking about our systems as we see models, datasets, and hardware continue to scale.
